capitalism.view.tables

Class IndustryColumn

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.control.TableColumnBase<S,T>
      • javafx.scene.control.TableColumn<Industry,java.lang.String>
        • capitalism.view.tables.IndustryColumn
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget

    public class IndustryColumn
extends javafx.scene.control.TableColumn<Industry,java.lang.String>
    An IndustryColumn contains the additional information needed to display a switchable graphic and to select the data item for display The data items delivered to the parent TableView for display in its cells are always strings; the type conversion is handled by the Industry class.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      IndustryColumn(Commodity commodity)
      Produces a column to be displayed in a Industry table(TableView<Industry,String>), whose value is a Stock field referenced by a foreign key in a Industry bean.
      IndustryColumn(Industry.INDUSTRY_ATTRIBUTE iNDUSTRY_ATTRIBUTE, boolean alignedLeft)
      Produces a column to be displayed in a Industry table(TableView<Industry,String>), whose value is a fixed field in a Industry bean that is chosen by the selector enum.

    • Constructor Detail

      • IndustryColumn

        public IndustryColumn(Industry.INDUSTRY_ATTRIBUTE iNDUSTRY_ATTRIBUTE,
                      boolean alignedLeft)
        Produces a column to be displayed in a Industry table(TableView<Industry,String>), whose value is a fixed field in a Industry bean that is chosen by the selector enum. Use the enum to set the header text and graphic, and prepare the column header so its graphic is switchable.
        Parameters:
        iNDUSTRY_ATTRIBUTE - an enum specifying which field to display
        alignedLeft - true if the field data is to be displayed aligned left (typically text strings such as the names of commodities or owners)

      • IndustryColumn

        public IndustryColumn(Commodity commodity)
        Produces a column to be displayed in a Industry table(TableView<Industry,String>), whose value is a Stock field referenced by a foreign key in a Industry bean. The magnitude is selected by the name of the Stock. Use Stock itself to set the header text and graphic, and prepare the column header so its graphic is switchable.
        Parameters:
        commodity - an enum specifying which productive Stock to display
